title: "Margin Span Test"
papersize: us-letter
format:
  html: default
  typst:
    keep-typ: true
_quarto:
  tests:
    typst:
      ensureTypstFileRegexMatches:
        - ['#note\(alignment: "baseline"']

        - - subject: "margin note"

            object: "Main text"
        - []
      noErrors: default
